name: Into the Crypt (NOOS3NCE, HeckinRed)
description:
You were but a lowly priest from a small European village, when one fateful night everyone in the town was turned into ghostly visages. While fighting your way out of town you were knocked out, and awoke in a crypt. Now you must find the chest that contains the key to the exit door, but watch out for what's lurking in the shadows...

KeyActionW
Move forwards.ATurn left.SMove backwards.DTurn right.EInteract with chests and doors.SPACEAttack enemies.

Thank you for checking out the game, hope you have a good romp!

The win conditions are simple:

  • You need to get the key that is stored in a chest somewhere in the level by grabbing it out with E
  • And you need to take the key to the exit door and use it with E
  • You can fight the enemies along the way

With this being only a week long adventure, obviously there are some bugs:

  • Sometimes the player will clip through walls.
  • Enemies will sometimes have no collision, and you can simply run around them.
  • You can spam the attack, and mow through enemies
